name: Pet Office
description:
Tom is a cat who dreams about his vacations. But he has a lot of work to do, and in order to take a vacation, he has to fulfill all the actives his boss ordered him to do. Then he woke up early and worked hard! 

Help Tom to complete his activities at work. Organize objects, stamp documents and make calculations, so that Tom can go on vacation!

Pet Office is available for Web, PC and Android.
